Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class roboptim::retargeting::ProblemBuilder< T >

Abstract Base Class for problem builders.

A problem builder is a class builder a RobOptim problem.

It takes as input strings describing which cost function to use, which constraints should be enabled, what trajectory representation should be chosen, etc.

Once the problem is built, it can be retrieved using the operator ().

Template Parameters:
Tproblem type
